      public List<String> getAllWorkStations()

    • selectWorkStation

      public List<String> selectWorkStation(String workStation)
      Sets the work station at which the mechanic works to the given work station and returns the pending tasks at this work post.
      Parameters:
      workStation - The name of the work station the mechanic wants to work at.
      Returns:
      List of pending tasks at the given work station

    • finishTask

      public List<String> finishTask(String task, int timeWorked)
      Finishes the given task and then gives an overview of the pending tasks at the mechanics work station.
      Parameters:
      task - The name of the task to be finished.
      Returns:
      List of pending tasks at the work station.
